root-layout.title: SUGAMING - Official gaming club of the Sofia University
root-layout.description: We are SUGAMING - the official gaming club of Sofia University. Our club consists of 2 parts - Game Development and Gaming Tournaments, with the idea being that video game enthusiasts can enjoy both, building an active community.

home-page.connecting-the-gaming-community: Connecting the gaming community of Sofia University

login-page.heading: Welcome back!
login-page.description: Log back in your account using your email and password or with a linked third-party account.

sign-up-page.description: Sign up for the SUGAMING club by filling-out the following form.
